p: Due to the sudden emergence of SARS-CoV-2, no specific antiviral agents are available. However, many drugs under development are believed to have potential anti-SARS-CoV-2 activity due to common biological processes in the virus life cycle. Currently, there are ~200 domestic clinical trials of COVID-19 drugs from the Chinese Clinical Trial Registry (ChiCTR) as of 10 March, and most are for chemical drugs, Chinese patent medicines, and combinations. All of these clinical trials were registered in 2020, after the outbreak of COVID-19 [ 11].
